mapper.select: SELECT g.inconSeq, g.inconCondition, g.inconSettleDate, g.inconRefund, g.inconRegDate, g.inconEdiDate, g.inconDelNy, g.inApplication_inappSeq, g.inMember_inmeSeq, g.inStaff_instSeq, g.inProduct_inproSeq, e.inappRequType, c.inmeName, c.inmeIdNumberFr, c.inmeIdNumberBa, c.inmeJobNy, d.instId, e.inappRecBankType, e.inappRecAccNo, f.inproName, f.inproGrade, f.inproContent, f.inproStartDate, f.inproEndDate FROM inContract AS g LEFT JOIN inApplication AS e ON g.inApplication_inappSeq = e.inappSeq LEFT JOIN inMember AS c ON e.inMember_inmeSeq = c.inmeSeq LEFT JOIN inStaff AS d ON g.inStaff_instSeq = d.instSeq LEFT JOIN inProduct AS f ON g.inProduct_inproSeq = f.inproSeq WHERE 1=1 AND g.inconSeq = #{inconSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inContract ( inconCondition, inconSettleDate, inconRefund, inconRegDate, inconEdiDate, inconDelNy, inApplication_inappSeq, inMember_inmeSeq, inStaff_instSeq, inProduct_inproSeq ) VALUES ( #{inconCondition}, #{inconSettleDate}, #{inconRefund}, now(), now(), 0, #{inApplication_inappSeq}, (SELECT inMember_inmeSeq FROM inApplication WHERE inappSeq = #{inApplication_inappSeq} ), #{inStaff_instSeq}, #{inProduct_inproSeq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE inContract SET inconCondition = #{inconCondition}, inconSettleDate = #{inconSettleDate}, inconRefund = #{inconRefund}, inconEdiDate = now(), inconDelNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND inconSeq = #{inconSeq}
